title: Statement from NSC Spokesperson Adrienne Watson on Ambassador Linda Thomas-Greenfield’s Participation in the Pacific Islands Forum | The White House
content: Ambassador Linda Thomas-Greenfield will represent President Biden at the Pacific Islands Forum leaders session with Forum Dialogue Partners in Rarotonga, Cook Islands, on November 10.  Ambassador Linda Thomas-Greenfield’s participation at the Pacific Islands Forum, as announced at the September 25th U.S.-Pacific Islands Forum Summit in Washington, reaffirms President Biden’s commitment to renewing and enhancing our relationships in the Pacific Islands, including through the region’s preeminent organization. ###
